sentences.sContent: She was trying to get her thoughts back into some semblance of order .
sentences.sCn: 她想稍微理出个头绪来。

sentences.sContent: After the war, life returned to a semblance of normality.
sentences.sCn: 战后，生活稍微恢复了正常。

remMethod.val: sembl (相像) + ance → 外表相似 → 伪装

trans.tranOther: a situation, condition etc that is close to or similar to a particular one, usually a good one
